page.title: 19ACTIVITIES & CLUBS IN ASH
page.content: There are five different sport clubs, the bowling club in Moat Lane, the cricket club, the football club and the tennis club which are in Ash recreation ground. A Badminton club meets in the Village Hall. Other clubs are the British Legion, Women's Institute, The National Housewive's Register, Good Companions - which is a social club for Old Age Pensioners, The Young Farmer's Club, The Ash Players - a theatrical group, League of Friends of Canterbury Hospital, the Scouts and Cub Scouts, Girl Guides and Brownies, The Trefoil Guild, Ash Youth Club, S.N.A.G. which stands for St Nicholas Activity Group, "Urchins", which is a Junior Youth Activities club, Mums and Toddlers (under 5's) who meet at the Library and Playgroup which meets in the Village Hall.
